forms.form: Rare. Only used with substantive adjectives.

glosses: scornfulness, sarcasm (use of acerbic language to mock or convey contempt)

examples.english: The play makes fun of the politicians.

words.etymology_text:
Unknown etymology. No cognates in closely related languages.
First attested in Daniel Juslenius: Suomalaisen Sana-Lugun Coetus ("Attempt at Listing Finnish Words", 1745).
